name: OnPoint Sale
tag_list: b2b, b2c, sales-leads, mobile-sales-leads, ucc, marketing-intelligence
overview:
OnPoint revolutionizes sales prospecting, through a web and mobile application allowing users access to critical market intelligence. Users spend less time cold calling and more time in front of the customers ACTUALLY in the market ready to buy their product!

What we do: OnPoint is a “Data As A Service” lead generation company. We mine, package and deliver sales leads via a web and mobile application. Sales organizations are looking for ways to “Increase revenues” or “Beat competitors into deals.” OnPoint was built 100% to answers these questions. Our customers are the MILLIONS of sales reps and organizations that are within the TRILLION dollar capital goods industries. These include copiers, medical devices, cars, heavy equipment and much more. Long story short, our start up is looking to erase or at least minimize the door to door or cold calling prospecting that 99% of American sales organizations rely upon! OnPoint has opened the doors to a new form of prospecting that leads to companies and reps FINDING, NEGOTIATING and CLOSING more deals!

How we do it: OnPoint has proprietary mining and categorization database that mines nationwide for ALL lease data for any capital good industries. User creates account and subscribes to have access to query our database. Users are able to search based on previous transactional values, date of last purchase or even competitor targeting. User purchases leads in A La Carte system. Think iTUNES here… User has individual account and can link this to their own individual CRMs and or software or databases.

If you want to demo our site, Login with beta@onpointsale.com Password: onpoint1
